messages.message:
Checking again, if anyone got Mixtral-8x7B running on Macbook -- would love help. I still haven't been able to get it run on my Macbook [and it's not failing because of GPU or Memory] -- it's erroring out in loading without much logging.

`anantb@XMRP4F7F9M ~ % llm -m mixtral-8x7b-v0.1.Q5_K_M 'What is Instabase?'`
`Error:`

Hi Anant, maybe you can try ollama. There are people successfully using it to run Mixtral on a powerful mac.

https://github.com/jmorganca/ollama/releases/tag/v0.1.16
It is based on a recent llama.cpp commit. So it should also work if you follow the steps in this commit: https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/4406
